roadmap.title: Solidify Front-End Development Skills
roadmap.description: Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build several small projects to practice and demonstrate these skills. Focus on responsive design and modern frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.

roadmap.title: Learn Back-End Development
roadmap.description: Choose a server-side language (Python, Node.js, Java, etc.) and a database technology (SQL, NoSQL).  Build projects that connect the front-end to the back-end, handling data and user interactions.

roadmap.title: Version Control and Deployment
roadmap.description: Learn Git and GitHub for version control.  Deploy projects on platforms like Netlify, Vercel, or Heroku to build a portfolio of live websites.

roadmap.title: Specialize and Build Advanced Projects
roadmap.description: Focus on a specific area like e-commerce, web applications, or interactive websites. Build more complex projects that showcase your skills and problem-solving abilities.

roadmap.title: Networking and Job Search
roadmap.description: Attend meetups, conferences, and online communities. Build your online presence through LinkedIn and contribute to open-source projects.  Tailor your resume and portfolio to target specific job roles.
